overview: An ape is suspected of committing a series of murders.
tagline: Out of the underworld comes the Gorilla---strangler of men---kidnapper of women! In come Mulligan and Garrity, two famous detectives who hear all, see all and know nothing! Out go the lights---on go the thrills! Shrieks! Yells! Roars! Screams! More Shrieks!
title: The Gorilla
